Reviews.Title: One of the best
Reviews.Author: aliwishes
Reviews.Content: I bought this awhile back and it does everything-it even talks and gives you hints and tips-those negative reviews I wouldn`t give any credit-Some people have trouble with life in general. It has the extended battery which I purchased as an extra. Make sure you turn it off with the power button. There is a demonstration on utube. It`s a bit larger than other flip phones. Nice size buttons. Good for large hands. Don`t believe anyone if they say it`s for small hands. It`s just right. Fits small and large hands.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Trish
Reviews.Content: Love this phone! It's unique, easy to use, and all around awesome. everywhere I go, I get comments on it and people asking what kind of phone it is.Pros---stylish, sleek, cool graphics.-easy to use, virtual qwerty keyboard.-flip open design makes it easy to answer calls--No more accidentally hanging up because of touching the wrong icon!-no dorky or boring ringtones! (this may not seem important, but I think it is. =)Cons---flip part can break fairly easily.  I snapped it off accidentally by trying to scrub off something on the clear part--oops. (I was able to superglue it back on though, and i can still call and text.) But if you understand that it can break and treat it as such, it should be fine.- I tried to upload music from my i-tunes account, and it did not work. turns out that you have to buy the songs off the music player in the phone. phooie.Because of the accident mentioned above, I've been needing a new phone. (I can do the necessary things, but cannot touch through the flip screen and such.) I am due for an update and have been searching for something that's versatile, cool, and does not require a data pack. After much frustration over the lack of phones that meet those categories, (they were either ugly, cheap-looking,or super expensive) I came to the realization that i just wanted my phone back. So I am buying the same one. Hooray!All in all, I would definitely buy this phone if you need something that's not too expensive, but also unique from what everybody else has out there. =)

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Great item. Definitely worth buying. It works great. totally worth the money. One of the best items for this price. I definitely suggest buying it. it works great for me, one of the best i have had.

Reviews.Title: Best Phone for Basic Phone Functions
Reviews.Author: slim6596
Reviews.Content: For those few of us that require a phone to function as a phone traditionally was meant to (voice calls), this is THE phone. AMAZING call quality, reception, and speakerphone. For other functions (texting, etc.), I will admit that it does not do those well. I had one of these a few years ago, then went to smartphones. I'm now back on regular phones and made a point of searching out the Krave. I will definitely be keeping this one.

Reviews.Title: great phone, no data plan required for this.
Reviews.Author: G$
Reviews.Content: screw Verizon and their data plan. great phone, no data plan required for this. no data plan, no data plan.

Reviews.Title: good concept, subpar execution
Reviews.Author: Binyamin
Reviews.Content: for a flip phone it's a looker. but it has a tendency to kind of do what it wants at times. and for the price you'd be better off getting a budget smartphone with more features.

Reviews.Title: One of the best phones ever
Reviews.Author: Nai
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my 56 year old mother and she absolutely loves it.  The camera is great, it is loght weight and a flip phone.I'd recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: beautiful to look at but impossible to use!!
Reviews.Author: Linda C. Passer
Reviews.Content: The phone was the worst I've ever had.  The built-in lock was impossible to take off when you needed to put in additional numbers; for example, after dialing a number, when requested to put in additional information, the lock came on and it was impossible to slide the lock off and by the time it really worked, the call was lost.  Very frustrating phone!!!

Reviews.Title: Better than describe
Reviews.Author: ludwig
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived days before estimate ( always a pleasant surprise, the shipping condition were excellent well wrap and seal. As for the phone itself i had no problem activating it on Verizon's network and adding it to my family plan. The unit was a very like new condition in fact my kid thing is a new phone, zero scratches, can with everything; even had the protective plastic shield on both screen.

Reviews.Title: It's a BASIC phone.. don't expect iphone or high end android useability
Reviews.Author: Gevo
Reviews.Content: The title says it all.Just to add, the touchscreen isn't the best, it's just one of the only decent looking basic phones available on verizon's list. Good for kids, like for my sisters.

Reviews.Title: Small phone
Reviews.Author: Deaner
Reviews.Content: This phone worked fine, but it is very small.  The screen, buttons and keyboard are best suited for small hands.

Reviews.Title: Condition
Reviews.Author: Robert Rudolph
Reviews.Content: The phone condition was neutral it has a crack on the flip that was not included in the detail description.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: natalie goodwin
Reviews.Content: cute,not what i expected, its better, it was ordered for my daughter who is enjoying it.not complicated to operate. pleased

Reviews.Title: The phone is okay....would not purchase it again
Reviews.Author: thankful
Reviews.Content: The phone is okay....would not purchase it again.  Can't really hear well when the flip top is open. Texting is horrible.

Reviews.Title: Motorola Krave New?
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Was supposed to be new but not sure?Some of the pixels on the screen are burnt out in a line it is annoying,would have returned it but that was the only one they had.I guess I have to live with it

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Valcala
Reviews.Content: This phone is good. Not better or worse than good, I got it for a great price, it's good for txting and some calling, you can tell it was of an earlier model and touch screen isn't too proficient, but you can get by.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Lucqbecks
Reviews.Content: First of all, this phone looks like lots of funs. But, I was wrong. It's annoying. It never cooperated. Texting was such a difficult task. I would just like to say i do not recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: worst "smart phone" ever
Reviews.Author: Sparkles
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone when it was first released about 2 years ago. let me just say, worst so called "smart" phone ever. the fancy dandy clear flip screen that was such a draw turned out to be a flop. the only thing that you could do through that flip thing was either look at your pictures or use data and cost money if you didn't have the data package. the screen lock for the flip screen was on the side, so if the phone was inserted into your pocket, the screen lock could come unlocked and the next thing you know, there is a huge charge on your bill for data usage that you never incurred. the phone was slow and not user friendly at all. the interface was complicated and you had to go around your elbow to get to your thumb to complete an action. even something simple such as texting, this phone found a way to make it complicated with the word completion program. you could type 2 letters and it finds the most off the wall words thinking that they were what you meant. i would never recommend this phone to someone looking for a smart phone, unless they like being annoyed and want to smash their phones to bits everytime they use it. needless to say, as soon as possible i upgraded and took out my frustrations on that POS.

Reviews.Title: Brown Box Bonanza
Reviews.Author: Tcboo94
Reviews.Content: This company gave me amazing help on researching phones. They also brought joy to my eyes by their kind costumer service while helping on the way. However, I did not by a phone from them because I found another one. But the company I bought from did not have as good as costumer service, so I wished Brown Box Bonanza sold the one I wanted.
